title: Fantasy Haircut
notes: A whimsical short film about a magical barbershop where miracles come true... well, not all of them.

title: The Owens Lake Series
notes: Stunning aerial photography by Tom Hegen. Abstract landscapes of what used to be a lake the size of Manhattan.

title: What the Heck is a Digital Garden?
notes: A thoughtful introduction to the concept of digital gardens as an alternative to traditional blogs.

title: A Brief History of Intelligence
notes: Max Bennett traces the evolution of intelligence from early neurons to AI. A fascinating journey through how brains developed.
